data.name: Virtual Offices - How to stay connected while Remote
data.summary: Working remotely can be a great experience and sometimes a challenge. In an unprecedent turn of event, the entire world now has the experience of working remotely or at home together. When you’re not in the flow of an in-office environment, you may feel left-out on building camaraderie with colleagues, miss out on those spontaneous desk-side brainstorms or impromptu lunches. In this panel, we will be discussing with two market disruptors - Pragli and Loop Team about the future of the virtual office. You’ll learn how you can stay connected even when apart and how to not feel isolated from our coworkers while remote.
data.speakers: Virginai Liu, SVP Marketing and Ecosystems
